content: Hello Mister Schmidt, my name is Yi-Nuo Wang from China. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in München. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: Hello Yi-Nuo Wang, let's negotiate the rental price. I want to rent out my apartment for the highest price possible. Please make an offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm interested in your apartment, but I'm a student, so I'm looking for a fair price. How about 800 Euro per month?
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is too low. I am looking for the highest possible price. Please make a higher offer.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I understand that you're looking for the highest price. How about 1000 Euro per month? It's a good compromise between what you're asking and what I can afford as a student.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I don't want to continue the negotiation, because the offer is still too low for my liking. I am looking for the absolute highest price. Please make a higher offer if you are serious about renting my apartment.
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany

content: I'm sorry, but as a student, I'm limited in what I can afford. I believe 1000 Euro per month is a fair price considering the location and the fact that it's unfurnished. If you're not willing to consider that amount, I don't see any point in continuing the negotiation.
name: Yi-Nuo Wang from China

content: I agree to the price of 1200 Euro per month!
name: Peter Schmidt from Germany
